game.miscDetails: Normal shots are made by tapping on the 'Shot' button. If you hold it down (and you are recharged), you get a temporary 'Reflect Barrier' that reflect all the ememies' shots back at them. You don't have a max number of times to use the reflect barrier, except there is a fairly short recharge time before you can use it again. The 'Force Bomb' button is like most shooter's bomb buttons (you have limited number bombs & one bomb is stronger than a normal shot).
